home.title: Document Objects
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Document Object

documentObject.name: Name

help.path: A string with slashes for creating a primary folder structure
help.name: The name of the document, used by the author
help.mimeType: The MIME type of the document
help.thumbnailUrl: The URL to access a thumbnail of the document
help.byteSize: Size in bytes of the document
help.numberOfPages: Number of pages of the document (if e.g. PDF). If not given, the document is not page oriented
